trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Mivli has a request which involves more than a little danger.
TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location and slay an overgrown megamaguey for its enlarged bulb.
TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the enlarged bulb to Mivli.
TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_MIVLI_000_000<tab>Say, you look like an intrepid individual. I could really use your help with something.
TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_MIVLI_000_001<tab>A short ways from here, in Chabameki, exceptionally large─shall we say, overgrown─megamaguey are known to appear.
TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_MIVLI_000_002<tab>I'd like you to take one down, and retrieve an enlarged bulb from its body. As for why, I'll tell you upon your return!
TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_MIVLI_000_003<tab>Go, my friend, and fell an overgrown megamaguey! I need an enlarged bulb from its body. I'll tell you why later!
TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_MIVLI_000_011<tab>A perfect specimen! This will surely make for fine mezcal!
TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_MIVLI_000_012<tab>Tell me, were you aware that it was actually the peoples of Xak Tural who taught we Pelupelu how to make mezcal?
TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_MIVLI_000_013<tab>They taught us to make the liquor with agave, but we also learned that using the bulb of a megamaguey gives the drink a real kick.
TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_MIVLI_000_014<tab>And the megamaguey would give <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> a real kick if I tried to procure their bulbs myself.
TEXT_KINGZB009_05038_MIVLI_000_015<tab>Which is why I can't thank you enough for your help! I've no doubt the batch of mezcal I make with this will be a delight!
